attributes.action: Persuade the North Norfolk Highways Autority to lift the ban on traders signs/advertising,on and adjacent to the pavement in Cromer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This ban has just been enforced despite many years of acceptance.The ban is only in force in Cromer but no other towns,near of far due to one complaint from a member of the public. Despite massive protest from traders and public alike the council says it will make no exceptions.
